aboutpara: Hello! My name is Charmelle Mhungu and I am a 4th year design student at MIT passionate about hands-on learning and making. From cinnamon rolls, to chairs, I love translating the ideas and concepts in my head into real life. Learning new tools and fabrication processes is one of my favorite parts of being a design student. Outside of class, I enjoy baking (my favorites right now are cinnamon rolls and brown butter chocolate chip cookies), hiking, and singing. Email me at cmmhungu at mit dot edu
